content.html: Having a loved one come out to you can be confusing and disorientating. There still isn't enough support for trans partners out there, and they often get utterly forgotten. Writing a tell-all for The Guardian that misgenders someone you love does nothing to fix that.
content.value:
Having a loved one come out to you can be confusing and disorientating. There still isn't enough support for trans partners out there, and they often get utterly forgotten.

Writing a tell-all for The Guardian that misgenders someone you love does nothing to fix that.
